Tests.comment: Description - Exports information into a CSV file and checks if the information match
Paramter - site_name: site to export CSV file from. Required. Default Value: None.
Parameter - downloadfolder: download location of csv file. Required. Default Value: None.
Description - Deletes a site
Parameter - use_global_test_device: use default information from UploadMTFFile Test. Required. Default Value: True
Parameter - site_name: name of site to delete. Required if use_global_test_device is false. Default Value: None
Parameter - neg_test: determine if this is a negative test. Optional. Default Value: False
Description - Deletes a feeder
Parameter - use_global_test_device: use default information from UploadMTFFile Test. Required. Default Value: True
Parameter - feeder_name: name of feeder to delete. Required if use_global_test_device is false. Default Value: None
Parameter - neg_test: determine if this is a negative test. Optional. Default Value: False
Description - Deletes a substation
Parameter - use_global_test_device: use default information from UploadMTFFile Test. Required. Default Value: True
Parameter - substation_name: name of substation to delete. Required if use_global_test_device is false. Default Value: None
Parameter - neg_test: determine if this is a negative test. Optional. Default Value: False
Description - Deletes a region
Parameter - use_global_test_device: use default information from UploadMTFFile Test. Required. Default Value: True
Parameter - region_name: name of region to delete. Required if use_global_test_device is false. Default Value: None
Parameter - neg_test: determine if this is a negative test. Optional. Default Value: False
This test verifies that all the devices should be shown based on the node selection from group tree
This test verifies that there should be summary of devices on top of this screen
This test verifies that there should be a new button for Add devices on Manage devices screen at region level
This test verifies that there should be a new button for Add devices on Manage devices screen at substation level
This test verifies that there should be a new button for Add devices on Manage devices screen at feeder level
This test verifies that there should be a new button for Add devices on Manage devices screen at site level
This test verifies that there should be a context menu to add devices at region level
This test verifies that there should be a context menu to add devices at sub station level
This test verifies that there should be a context menu to add devices at feeder level
This test verifies that there should be a context menu to add devices at site level
This test verifies that a new column with name field note should be added to Device_Management menu list
This test verifies that a new column with name field note should be empty
This test verifies that a field notes accepts long value for field note
This test verifies that a new column with name field note should be added to Device_Management menu list
Test verifies that user can edit any device information from the Device_Management-Manage device screen on organization/Region/substation/Feeder/site level.
This test verifies that there should be a new button for Add devices on Manage devices screen at organization node level
This test verifies that there should be a new button for Add devices on Manage devices screen at organization node level
Test verifies that user can get the error message Device exist for this Phase in Device_Management-Manage device screen on organization/Region/substation/Feeder/site level.
This test verifies that the tool tip on device status shows the right status in Managed devices screen
Test verifies that user can get the error message Please fill all mandatory fields in Device_Management-Manage device screen on organization/Region/substation/Feeder/site level.
Test verifies that user can get the error message Device exist for this Phase in Device_Management Manage device screen on organizationRegionsubstationFeedersite level.
Test verifies the Flash LED does not flash when device is offline
Test verifies that user can edit any device description field on any region, substation, feeder and site in Device_Management-Manage device screen on organization/Region/substation/Feeder/site level.

Test verifies that user can edit any device state from current device state to different device state on same region, substation, feeder and site in Device_Management-Manage device screen on organization/Region/substation/Feeder/site level.
Test verifies that user can move any device from current region to different region in Device_Management-Manage device screen on organization/Region/substation/Feeder/site level.
